channel.title: CVE Feed for Wireshark Foundation -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-0208|2024-10-03T06:23:17.720Z -- wireshark%20foundation -- wireshark
item.description: GVCP dissector crash in Wireshark 4.2.0, 4.0.0 to 4.0.11, and 3.6.0 to 3.6.19 allows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file
